name: Bloom and Gloom
description:
Created for Game Jam 2023 within 48 hours. Part of the London Game Dev X London Game Jam 2023. 

Theme: Roots

BLOOM AND GLOOM

Turn-based strategy game where you cultivate a garden while fighting the evil corruption at the same time. Plan your next moves carefully to protect your precious plants from perishing!

Team:

  • Runefish: Design Generalist
  • Oli4mate: System Design
  • Ferrance: Production, Marketing,  Sound Design
  • ElysiaLuna: VFX
  • Hailfire: Concept Art, Promotional Art, UI Assets
  • Reinamie: 3D Environment Art
  • Seo: Character Animation

Controls:

  • Q: Watering plants
  • E: Protecting plants
  • R: Cutting plants
  • Others: TBA
